name: Starforged Crew Sheet
description:
Starforged Crew Sheet Interactive playkit for the Starforged RPG This looks fantastic, especially for co-op/guided play. Will be yoinking for my own use. ... Thank you for your work on the Starforged character keeper! It's amazing.

– Shawn Tomkin, creator of Ironsworn & Starforged

Solo play: Hide unused character sheets. 

Co-op & Guided play: Share the edit link with your group of up to 8 players to collaborate on the file in real-time. 

Features
  • Up to 8 characters (with synced Supply values)
  • Starship sheet (with overview of crew stats and condition meters)
  • Interactive progress tracks, clocks, and dice-roller
  • Sector map templates
